attributes.action: Remove MEP status from Nigel Farage for insulting the European Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: EU exit negotiations will require people with skill and integrity, silly schoolboy jibes at MEP's is not acceptable and is a danger to our position, we have a limited time to complete the negotiations and people like farage should not waste that time with his drivel and silly schoolboy comments. He should, like he said, relocate to the USA and let the rest of us try to make a go of this disaster.
attributes.background: In the name of the British people Nigel farage called MEP's Mafia and Gangsters during a European debate on the exit terms for Britain, this insult could be extremely damaging to our position and shows that Nigel farage has no diplomatic attributes at all, a new election should bar him from standing
